predicate.note: Frames file for 'compile' based on sentence in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'collect'.

example.name: active transitive
example.text: [One of Dun & Bradstreet's chief businesses]-1 is *trace*-1 compiling reports that rate the credit-worthiness of millions of American companies.
example.arg: reports that rate the credit-worthiness of millions of American companies

example.name: passive, stock offerings
example.text: The following were among [yesterday's offerings and pricings in the U.S. and non-U.S. capital markets, with terms and syndicate manager,]-1 as *trace*-1 compiled *trace*-1 by Dow Jones Capital Markets Report:

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: John compiled a list of suspected communists for Senator McCarthy.
